CommonEvent[8].message[1].textLine[2]: the studies performed. No witnesses, so to speak."
CommonEvent[8].message[2].textLine[0]: "Cruelty is not unheard in times of war. I'm sure

CommonEvent[8].message[3].textLine[0]: "But some things exceed the limits any human should

CommonEvent[10].message[0].textLine[2]: I've had feverish dreams for the longest time now. In the

CommonEvent[10].message[0].textLine[4]: the swirling clouds. They haunt even my waking hours."

CommonEvent[11].message[0].textLine[2]: "The City of Ma'habre. You have seen it too, haven't you?
CommonEvent[11].message[0].textLine[3]: In your dreams you've wandered for lifetimes
CommonEvent[11].message[0].textLine[4]: with the silhouette of the city on the horizon.
CommonEvent[11].message[1].textLine[0]: "You have seen the great towers that rise up
CommonEvent[11].message[1].textLine[1]: to the impossibly black night sky. Macabre obelisks,
CommonEvent[11].message[1].textLine[2]: whispering of some older, crueler age.
CommonEvent[11].message[2].textLine[0]: "You have seen the grand gate, with its maddening
CommonEvent[11].message[2].textLine[1]: murals and spirals - patterns beyond understanding."
CommonEvent[11].message[3].textLine[0]: "And if the sound of the wind howling through
CommonEvent[11].message[4].textLine[0]: "You've also heard the sound of local residents, haven't you?
CommonEvent[11].message[4].textLine[1]: Even though you know that this place
CommonEvent[11].message[5].textLine[0]: "...You still hear them, don't you? You are never alone there,
CommonEvent[11].message[5].textLine[1]: in that vile part of the world."
CommonEvent[11].message[6].textLine[0]: "In your dreams you have seen it, haven't you?
CommonEvent[11].message[6].textLine[1]: The City of Ma'habre. The City of Gods."
CommonEvent[11].message[7].textLine[0]: "But did you know that it still exists within our world?"
CommonEvent[12].message[1].textLine[0]: "To give room for new generations, for new trees to
CommonEvent[12].message[1].textLine[1]: grow and propagate - the prior forest needs to be burnt down.
CommonEvent[12].message[1].textLine[2]: Such is the rule of creation."
CommonEvent[12].message[2].textLine[0]: "Creation and Destruction, one does not exist without the
CommonEvent[12].message[2].textLine[1]: other. The destruction is called Gro-goroth, the destroyer
CommonEvent[12].message[3].textLine[0]: "Common men fear destruction, because they get accustomed
CommonEvent[12].message[3].textLine[1]: to peace and quiet. They grow fat and afraid of change."
CommonEvent[12].message[4].textLine[0]: "But change is inevitable, just like Gro-goroth."
CommonEvent[12].message[5].textLine[0]: "But there is no need for fear! The destruction is pure,
CommonEvent[12].message[5].textLine[1]: and does not target anyone specifically. It simply
CommonEvent[12].message[6].textLine[0]: "Interesting note on Gro-goroth - he is of a curious kind.
CommonEvent[12].message[6].textLine[1]: More so than any of the other old gods."
CommonEvent[12].message[7].textLine[0]: "To relieve our feelings of fear, Gro-goroth wears
CommonEvent[12].message[7].textLine[1]: the bodies and skins of men and women alike."
CommonEvent[12].message[8].textLine[0]: "He might still be walking among us, masked by the
CommonEvent[12].message[8].textLine[1]: facade of hanging flesh, blessing us with his presence and
CommonEvent[13].message[0].textLine[4]: The following pages tell of the events that took place
CommonEvent[13].message[0].textLine[5]: in the year 809 after the birth of our christ,
CommonEvent[13].message[1].textLine[0]: "The tale of the fellowship is familiar to many
CommonEvent[13].message[1].textLine[1]: but few know the factual story which all the
CommonEvent[13].message[1].textLine[2]: poems and songs are based on."
CommonEvent[13].message[3].textLine[1]: and then there was the fifth one - one who never aspired
CommonEvent[13].message[3].textLine[2]: to the same greatness as the rest of the party - whose
CommonEvent[13].message[3].textLine[3]: story bears no listeners. The forgotten one."
CommonEvent[13].message[4].textLine[0]: "The fellowship was formed to seek the older gods,
CommonEvent[13].message[4].textLine[1]: they who had left humanity without guidance,
CommonEvent[13].message[4].textLine[2]: without aid in times of great peril."
CommonEvent[13].message[5].textLine[0]: "The great kingdoms were slowly rotting away, and the grand
CommonEvent[13].message[5].textLine[1]: values mankind once aimed for were displaced by defiled
CommonEvent[13].message[6].textLine[0]: "Back then, there existed an old tomb that led to the
CommonEvent[13].message[6].textLine[1]: ancient city of Mahavre. The city worked as a hub for
CommonEvent[13].message[6].textLine[2]: multiple different planes of existence. It was a place
CommonEvent[13].message[6].textLine[3]: where a man could meet his maker."
CommonEvent[13].message[7].textLine[0]: "Those who set foot inside the city would be lost,
CommonEvent[13].message[7].textLine[1]: caught in the endless swirling dimensions
CommonEvent[13].message[8].textLine[0]: "It is here that the fellowship would demand the
CommonEvent[13].message[9].textLine[0]: "Freedom to choose our own destiny and build the future

CommonEvent[19].message[0].textLine[3]: "Prisoner from cell C1: She had beautiful skin.
CommonEvent[19].message[0].textLine[4]: I carved her curves open. She took pain surprisingly
CommonEvent[19].message[0].textLine[5]: well. When she asked me to stop, I cut out her tongue."
CommonEvent[19].message[1].textLine[0]: "Prisoner from cell C4: Feeling aroused from the
CommonEvent[19].message[1].textLine[1]: earlier inmate, I inserted nails inside his male organs."
CommonEvent[19].message[2].textLine[0]: "Prisoner from cell A2: He can't take manymore
CommonEvent[19].message[2].textLine[1]: sessions with me. Whatever I did, he remained distant."
CommonEvent[19].message[3].textLine[0]: "Captain Rudimer took my big war criminal deeper below.
CommonEvent[19].message[3].textLine[1]: I got the feeling that high priestess Selene wants to have her
CommonEvent[19].message[4].textLine[0]: "Of course, Captain Rudimer is completely oblivious to this.
CommonEvent[19].message[4].textLine[1]: I'd tell him, but I'm not exactly his trusted adviser.
CommonEvent[19].message[4].textLine[2]: He doesn't believe anything I say. He's under the impression
CommonEvent[19].message[4].textLine[3]: that I'm a complete savage who has lost his mind. Oh well."
CommonEvent[20].message[1].textLine[1]: The seed of a false god laid down in a virgin mother - a god"
CommonEvent[20].message[2].textLine[1]: 12 apostles from his most trusted companions.
CommonEvent[20].message[2].textLine[2]: Together they were to bring back the old world order."
CommonEvent[20].message[3].textLine[0]: "The kings and sultans of the time would not stand idle
CommonEvent[20].message[3].textLine[1]: while a man of undeniable god-like posture came down to
CommonEvent[20].message[4].textLine[0]: "Instead they would capture Alll-mer. The newborn god
CommonEvent[20].message[4].textLine[1]: would be nailed onto a cross, arms spread wide, and be
CommonEvent[20].message[4].textLine[2]: left for the crows to feast on."
CommonEvent[20].message[5].textLine[0]: "But Alll-mer was to ascend. Arms still wide spread from
CommonEvent[20].message[5].textLine[1]: the cross, he would soar. Becoming the symbol we know today.
CommonEvent[20].message[5].textLine[2]: Turning his tortured posture into something greater
CommonEvent[20].message[5].textLine[3]: greater. A symbol of hope and domination."
CommonEvent[20].message[6].textLine[0]: "Spending three days and nights in the city of the gods,
CommonEvent[20].message[6].textLine[1]: Ma'habre, he then returned to walk amongst men. With his
CommonEvent[20].message[6].textLine[2]: mourning 11 apostles he murdered the jealous
CommonEvent[20].message[6].textLine[3]: kings and sultans - as was just."
CommonEvent[20].message[7].textLine[0]: "Thus he brought back the old world order."
CommonEvent[21].message[1].textLine[0]: "Sylvian is the goddess of love, lust, and creation."
CommonEvent[21].message[2].textLine[0]: "She created men and women at the dawn of time. From the
CommonEvent[21].message[2].textLine[1]: very first moments, she loved her children greatly."
CommonEvent[21].message[3].textLine[0]: "Over time, her love blossomed into a more obsessive form
CommonEvent[21].message[3].textLine[1]: and she would try to guide her children more and more."
CommonEvent[21].message[4].textLine[0]: "Once she realized her children would never be able to
CommonEvent[21].message[4].textLine[1]: return the same amount of affection back to her, her love
CommonEvent[21].message[5].textLine[0]: "Sylvian would shape mankind more to her liking and more
CommonEvent[21].message[5].textLine[1]: into her own image with her gift to humanity - love magic,
CommonEvent[21].message[6].textLine[0]: "For a brief moment in ancient history, mankind fell into
CommonEvent[21].message[6].textLine[1]: a craze of fleshly delights, a synchronized mass
CommonEvent[21].message[6].textLine[2]: of naked bodies pulsating and wasting their days
CommonEvent[21].message[6].textLine[3]: in the throes of wild lust."
CommonEvent[21].message[7].textLine[0]: "There are still cults dedicated to Sylvian to this day,
CommonEvent[21].message[7].textLine[1]: but many believe she left mankind behind long, long ago."

CommonEvent[30].message[3].textLine[1]: It is breathing lightly and seems to be in constant
CommonEvent[30].message[4].textLine[1]: The life form is ever so hungry, but no matter how much
CommonEvent[30].message[4].textLine[2]: nourishment I feed it, there is no visible growth."
CommonEvent[30].message[5].textLine[0]: "I am doing experiments with different sources of food

CommonEvent[30].message[6].textLine[1]: The appetite is nothing short of astonishing, but it
CommonEvent[30].message[6].textLine[2]: produces no effect on its growth."
CommonEvent[30].message[7].textLine[1]: I killed the child. It had no purpose in this world."
CommonEvent[30].message[8].textLine[0]: "I am questioning whether we, as humans, were ever meant

CommonEvent[30].message[8].textLine[2]: teachings of the older gods to attain such miracles."

CommonEvent[60].message[0].textLine[1]: "-The Tale of the Pocketcat. Chapter I -
CommonEvent[60].message[0].textLine[2]: It was a rainy day in the countryside just north from the
CommonEvent[60].message[1].textLine[0]: "Willem, the wildest child known in the town, would stare at
CommonEvent[60].message[1].textLine[1]: the rain drops behind the window screen."
CommonEvent[60].message[2].textLine[0]: "His mother would warn him of going outside. During rain
CommonEvent[60].message[2].textLine[1]: decent boys would help their parents with various indoors
CommonEvent[60].message[2].textLine[2]: tasks. Rain brings forth all kinds of dangers not otherwise
CommonEvent[60].message[3].textLine[0]: "Disregarding the warnings and without a worry in the world,
CommonEvent[60].message[3].textLine[1]: Willem dashed through the bushes and ran deep in to the Merwood."
CommonEvent[60].message[4].textLine[0]: "In the heart of the forest, all wet from the rain, Willem
CommonEvent[60].message[4].textLine[1]: heard slight panting noices from an overgrown grotto nearby..."
CommonEvent[60].message[6].textLine[0]: "He would not believe his eyes when he saw a finely dressed
CommonEvent[60].message[6].textLine[1]: cat standing on two feet, twice as tall as Willem's father
CommonEvent[60].message[7].textLine[0]: "The cat's back was facing Willem. Its hand was moving
CommonEvent[60].message[7].textLine[1]: swiftly inside its pocket while the two big yellow eyes
CommonEvent[60].message[7].textLine[2]: glee'd inside a burlap bag in great excitement."
CommonEvent[60].message[8].textLine[0]: "Suddenly the hand movement came to a halt."
CommonEvent[60].message[9].textLine[0]: "Even if Willem was well hidden behind the leaves - slowly
CommonEvent[60].message[9].textLine[1]: the cat turned  eyes towards him."
CommonEvent[60].message[10].textLine[0]: "In terror Willem ran as fast as he could towards his home!"
CommonEvent[60].message[11].textLine[0]: "The two glowing yellow eyes of the cat haunted him all the
CommonEvent[60].message[12].textLine[0]: "His mother was there to meet him by the front door.
CommonEvent[60].message[12].textLine[1]: 'So you just had to go to the woods, did you?' - said
CommonEvent[60].message[13].textLine[0]: "'You saw something you shouldn't have, right?!' - questioned
CommonEvent[60].message[13].textLine[1]: his mother. 'And how do I know this?'"
CommonEvent[60].message[14].textLine[0]: "Willem's mother would go inside to get a little parcel with
CommonEvent[60].message[15].textLine[0]: "'This appeared on the front door just before you came.
CommonEvent[60].message[15].textLine[1]: It was directed to young mister Willem.'"
CommonEvent[60].message[16].textLine[0]: "Slowly Willem unwrapped the decorated paper with small
CommonEvent[61].message[0].textLine[2]: Trorrtur once again went too far with his wicked methods.
CommonEvent[61].message[0].textLine[3]: The prisoner was but a child, but already he had to go through
CommonEvent[61].message[0].textLine[4]: so much torture that he shit himself more than he bled."
CommonEvent[61].message[1].textLine[0]: "I must say - I'm afraid of Trortur to a certain degree. Sometimes
CommonEvent[61].message[1].textLine[1]: I think I would do this world justice if I just off'd him with
CommonEvent[61].message[2].textLine[0]: "Very few know, but Trortur used to be a famed holy knight
CommonEvent[61].message[2].textLine[1]: of Rondon back in the day. He was able to achieve great fame
CommonEvent[61].message[2].textLine[2]: at a very young age. But during our holy campaign against
CommonEvent[61].message[3].textLine[0]: "Everyone presumed him as dead. He died as a war hero. He
CommonEvent[61].message[3].textLine[1]: should have died as a war hero. But 5 years later when we
CommonEvent[61].message[3].textLine[2]: occupied the eastern capital Jettaiah, we also found what was
CommonEvent[61].message[4].textLine[0]: "He was but a shadow of his former self. A disfigured,
CommonEvent[61].message[4].textLine[1]: hunchback man with barely any resemblance to the great hero
CommonEvent[61].message[4].textLine[2]: so many adored. I am sure during those 5 years, he went
CommonEvent[61].message[4].textLine[3]: through every method of torture, he now puts to use himself."
CommonEvent[61].message[5].textLine[0]: "Just to honor the memory of Trortur the White, I let this
CommonEvent[61].message[5].textLine[1]: monster live today. Although I see great contradiction in my
CommonEvent[62].message[0].textLine[4]: It was a mistake to take this position in these dungeons. It's
CommonEvent[62].message[0].textLine[5]: next to impossible to keep any kind of order among troops here."
CommonEvent[62].message[1].textLine[0]: "There are powers at play here, that we as mere mortals,
CommonEvent[62].message[1].textLine[1]: cannot fight against. I've come to accept the madness. A naked
CommonEvent[62].message[1].textLine[2]: prisoner crucified on a sacrificial statue with his guts hanging
CommonEvent[62].message[1].textLine[3]: out? Just another day in the dungeons."
CommonEvent[62].message[2].textLine[0]: "More and more troops commiting suicide every day? More
CommonEvent[62].message[2].textLine[1]: food for those left! Orders to let some cultists do their
CommonEvent[62].message[2].textLine[2]: wicked rituals here? Anything goes! All the gore and macabre
CommonEvent[62].message[2].textLine[3]: scenery has become trivial to me."
CommonEvent[62].message[3].textLine[0]: "The High priest demanded that we give them our prized
CommonEvent[62].message[3].textLine[1]: prisoner, the captain of the mercenary army, Le'garde of
CommonEvent[62].message[4].textLine[0]: "I hesitated at first. After all his worth in propaganda
CommonEvent[62].message[4].textLine[1]: alone cannot be underestimated. But those priests somehow
CommonEvent[62].message[4].textLine[2]: convinced higher ups of their ways."
CommonEvent[62].message[5].textLine[0]: "Le'garde was transferred to the lower levels, below the
CommonEvent[62].message[5].textLine[1]: mines. I have no idea what is the purpose behind this,
CommonEvent[62].message[5].textLine[2]: nothing good can come out of it but orders are orders."
CommonEvent[62].message[6].textLine[0]: "I feel bad for the poor man. It's obvious the kingdom of
CommonEvent[62].message[6].textLine[1]: Rondon backstabbed him, just because he was gaining influence
CommonEvent[62].message[6].textLine[2]: at such a rapid rate. And now his story ends here, defiled
CommonEvent[63].message[0].textLine[4]: "In this book, I will recount what I learned at the Eastern
CommonEvent[63].message[0].textLine[5]: Sanctuaries with my late master Nas'hrah the great."
CommonEvent[63].message[1].textLine[0]: "You see, I was given honor of being an apprentice to the
CommonEvent[63].message[1].textLine[1]: great wizard. My time with him was brief, and I only managed
CommonEvent[63].message[1].textLine[2]: to scratch the surface of the immense knowledge he posessed."
CommonEvent[63].message[2].textLine[0]: "In this book I will list out the secrets and spells he spoke
CommonEvent[63].message[2].textLine[1]: of. On how to acquire the knowledge behind blood magic
CommonEvent[63].message[2].textLine[2]: and flower magic - You must seek that information elsewhere."
CommonEvent[63].message[4].textLine[0]: "I know of the 1st secret of Gro-goroth:
CommonEvent[63].message[4].textLine[1]: If I see, hanging from a tree a dead mans corpse, I wish
CommonEvent[63].message[4].textLine[2]: upon his soul and bind it back to their umbilical cord. And
CommonEvent[63].message[4].textLine[3]: then that corpse will walk and speak again with me."
CommonEvent[63].message[5].textLine[0]: "I know of the 1st secret of Sylvian:
CommonEvent[63].message[5].textLine[1]: If I sprinkle my seed inside the womb of the freshly-deceased,
CommonEvent[63].message[5].textLine[2]: the life that is left lingering in that corpse will sprout
CommonEvent[63].message[5].textLine[3]: a son in my name. a son that will live a life of violence."
CommonEvent[63].message[6].textLine[0]: "I know of the 2nd secret of Gro-goroth:
CommonEvent[63].message[6].textLine[1]: The miniscule world I have always felt curiosity for becomes
CommonEvent[63].message[6].textLine[2]: understandable to me. I am finally able to converse with the
CommonEvent[63].message[6].textLine[3]: insects around me and have them reveal their deepest secrets."
CommonEvent[63].message[7].textLine[0]: "I know of the 2nd secret of Sylvian:
CommonEvent[63].message[7].textLine[1]: I no longer have to fear for separation from my loved ones,
CommonEvent[63].message[7].textLine[2]: for we can forever join in a marriage of flesh. An act of
CommonEvent[63].message[7].textLine[3]: love that creates a beautiful union of two souls."
CommonEvent[63].message[8].textLine[0]: "I know of the 3rd secret of Gro-goroth:
CommonEvent[63].message[8].textLine[1]: For all the wrong that they have done to me, I can merely
CommonEvent[63].message[8].textLine[2]: point my finger and unleash the violence at them in a
CommonEvent[63].message[9].textLine[0]: "I know of the 3rd secret of Sylvian:
CommonEvent[63].message[9].textLine[1]: As human beings are simple creatures guided by their feelings
CommonEvent[63].message[9].textLine[2]: and lusts, I can easily control their affections in the most

CommonEvent[146].message[0].textLine[1]: "Captain Rudimer - 5th of the nineth moon of 1490 -
CommonEvent[146].message[0].textLine[2]: The tree haunts my waking hours, it haunts my
CommonEvent[146].message[0].textLine[3]: feverish dreams - I haven't had a moment of tranquility
CommonEvent[146].message[1].textLine[0]: "Everything I see seems to remind me of its
CommonEvent[146].message[2].textLine[0]: "I swear the intestines of a gutted prisoner from
CommonEvent[146].message[2].textLine[1]: yesterday took the very same shape..."
CommonEvent[146].message[3].textLine[0]: "But when I try to, describe its organic, evershaping
CommonEvent[146].message[3].textLine[1]: pattern to scholars, or draw it here on this very paper
CommonEvent[146].message[4].textLine[0]: "Like a bonfire, with flames reaching out to the night
CommonEvent[146].message[4].textLine[1]: sky - so is its shape without a concrete form."
CommonEvent[146].message[5].textLine[0]: "It is dangerous without a doubt. Effects like
CommonEvent[146].message[5].textLine[1]: this are far too much for mere humans to comphrehend.
CommonEvent[146].message[5].textLine[2]: I myself am proof of this. My obesssion
CommonEvent[146].message[6].textLine[0]: "That is why I isolated the tree to inner courtyard
CommonEvent[146].message[6].textLine[1]: with no doorways leading to its embrace. I had
CommonEvent[146].message[7].textLine[0]: "Still through the walls, I can hear its lure.

CommonEvent[152].message[0].textLine[1]: Where do you want to travel?
CommonEvent[155].message[1].textLine[0]: "The effects of different herbs and plants are listed
CommonEvent[155].message[2].textLine[0]: "Blue - Blue herb has healing properties. It's often rubbed
CommonEvent[155].message[2].textLine[1]: against open wounds and injuries. The effects are almost
CommonEvent[155].message[3].textLine[0]: "Green - Green herbs are commonly used on open wounds to
CommonEvent[155].message[4].textLine[0]: "Red - Red herbs have little to no effect on their own, but
CommonEvent[155].message[4].textLine[1]: when used together with other herbs, it has a boosting
CommonEvent[155].message[5].textLine[0]: "Cave moss - Rare moss that grows in caverns and other
CommonEvent[155].message[5].textLine[1]: dark and moist areas. The moss is especially protein-rich.
CommonEvent[155].message[6].textLine[2]: Green + Red = Antidote for mild poisons
CommonEvent[156].message[0].textLine[4]: "The book of medical science - The book of Anathomia.
CommonEvent[156].message[0].textLine[5]: Collected knowledge of Homer of the Abyssonia."
CommonEvent[156].message[7].textLine[0]: "This book by no means covers everything under the sun and
CommonEvent[156].message[7].textLine[1]: stars and thus it should only be used as a reference.
CommonEvent[157].message[0].textLine[3]: The fellowship found their way to the ancient tombs that
CommonEvent[157].message[0].textLine[4]: would lead them to their confrontation with the older gods."
CommonEvent[157].message[1].textLine[0]: "The fellowship persisted through the numerous hazards
CommonEvent[157].message[1].textLine[1]: and dangers the older gods threw at them. Eventually all
CommonEvent[157].message[1].textLine[2]: five of them would reach the golden gates of Mahavre, the
CommonEvent[157].message[1].textLine[3]: very same gates Alll-mer ascended from 800 years prior."
CommonEvent[157].message[2].textLine[0]: "It seemed like the fellowship had bested all the
CommonEvent[157].message[2].textLine[1]: challenges gods layed for them, but at the most crucial
CommonEvent[157].message[2].textLine[2]: moment a seed of doubt was planted into the mind of the
CommonEvent[157].message[3].textLine[0]: "The forgotten one was the last trial the old gods had
CommonEvent[157].message[3].textLine[1]: in store. His purpose in the grand scheme of things was
CommonEvent[157].message[3].textLine[2]: to create doubt and unease between the fellowship."
CommonEvent[157].message[4].textLine[0]: "Holding tight to their grand mission, the fellowship
CommonEvent[157].message[4].textLine[1]: prevailed however. They laid down all the doubts and
CommonEvent[157].message[4].textLine[2]: proceeded to the golden temple of Mahavre."
CommonEvent[157].message[5].textLine[0]: "The fellowship tore down the legacy of the old gods and
CommonEvent[157].message[5].textLine[1]: created a new world order. An age where mankind decided
CommonEvent[157].message[5].textLine[2]: their own fate. An age of growth and prosperity."
CommonEvent[157].message[6].textLine[0]: "The fellowship became the new gods we know and love today."
CommonEvent[158].message[0].textLine[2]: The fellowship found their way to the ancient tombs that
CommonEvent[158].message[0].textLine[3]: would lead them to their confrontation with the older gods."
CommonEvent[158].message[1].textLine[0]: "The fellowship persisted through the numerous hazards
CommonEvent[158].message[1].textLine[1]: and dangers the older gods threw at them. Eventually all
CommonEvent[158].message[1].textLine[2]: five of them would reach the golden gates of Ma'habre, the
CommonEvent[158].message[1].textLine[3]: very same gates Alll-mer ascended from 800 years prior."
CommonEvent[158].message[2].textLine[0]: "It seemed like the fellowship had bested all the
CommonEvent[158].message[2].textLine[1]: challenges gods layed for them, but at the most crucial
CommonEvent[158].message[2].textLine[2]: moment a seed of doubt was planted into the mind of the
CommonEvent[158].message[3].textLine[0]: "The forgotten one was a scholar of many arts and sciences,
CommonEvent[158].message[3].textLine[1]: and as such, believed only their lying eyes. The Older
CommonEvent[158].message[3].textLine[2]: gods would use this to their advantage and create a grand
CommonEvent[158].message[3].textLine[3]: lie. A lie about the greater scheme of things."
CommonEvent[158].message[4].textLine[0]: "The grand lie told of the way the older gods directed the
CommonEvent[158].message[4].textLine[1]: flow of mankind. That many had undergone the same trials
CommonEvent[158].message[4].textLine[2]: as the fellowship, but nothing ever changed for the better.
CommonEvent[158].message[4].textLine[3]: Mankind continued to struggle, just as it had always done."
CommonEvent[158].message[5].textLine[0]: "This suspicion created a drift between the fellowship.
CommonEvent[158].message[5].textLine[1]: In the end, the four other members proceeded with the
CommonEvent[158].message[5].textLine[2]: initial mission, trusting that fate and glory lay just
CommonEvent[158].message[6].textLine[0]: "The fellowship tore down the legacy of the old gods and
CommonEvent[158].message[6].textLine[1]: created a new world order. An age where mankind decided
CommonEvent[158].message[6].textLine[2]: its own fate. An age of growth and prosperity."
CommonEvent[158].message[7].textLine[0]: "The fellowship became the new gods we know and love today."
CommonEvent[158].message[8].textLine[0]: "The forgotten one was never again seen or heard. The fifth
CommonEvent[158].message[8].textLine[1]: one simply disappeared in the dusts of time..."
CommonEvent[159].message[0].textLine[3]: The following pages tell of the events that took place
CommonEvent[159].message[0].textLine[4]: in the year 809 after the birth of our christ,
CommonEvent[159].message[2].textLine[1]: and then there was the fifth one - one who never aspired
CommonEvent[159].message[2].textLine[2]: for the same greatness as the rest of the party - whose
CommonEvent[159].message[2].textLine[3]: story bears no listeners. The forgotten one."
CommonEvent[159].message[3].textLine[0]: "The fellowship was formed to seek the older gods, who
CommonEvent[159].message[3].textLine[1]: had left humanity without guidance, without aid in the
CommonEvent[159].message[4].textLine[0]: "The great kingdoms were slowly rotting away and the grand
CommonEvent[159].message[4].textLine[1]: values mankind once aimed for were displaced by defiled
CommonEvent[159].message[5].textLine[0]: "Back then, there was an old tomb that led to
CommonEvent[159].message[5].textLine[1]: the ancient city of Ma'habre, the hub for
CommonEvent[159].message[5].textLine[2]: myriad different planes of existence. A place
CommonEvent[159].message[5].textLine[3]: where a man could meet his maker."
CommonEvent[159].message[6].textLine[0]: "Those who set foot inside would be lost,
CommonEvent[159].message[6].textLine[1]: caught in the endless swirling dimensions
CommonEvent[159].message[7].textLine[0]: "It is here, that the fellowship would demand the
CommonEvent[159].message[8].textLine[0]: "Freedom to choose our own destiny and build the future
CommonEvent[160].message[0].textLine[3]: once upon a time, There was this foolish traveler who had
CommonEvent[160].message[0].textLine[4]: gone on a journey. Why was he foolish? Well because he was
CommonEvent[160].message[1].textLine[0]: "Everywhere he went people made up all kinds of sad stories
CommonEvent[160].message[1].textLine[1]: to tell him, and the traveler fell for every one of them."
CommonEvent[160].message[2].textLine[0]: "Pretty soon his money, his clothes, even his shoes had
CommonEvent[160].message[2].textLine[1]: been cheated away from him, but the foolish traveller was
CommonEvent[160].message[2].textLine[2]: always glad to help and he always told people the same

CommonEvent[160].message[3].textLine[2]: road and travel through the dense forest where no one

CommonEvent[183].message[0].textLine[1]: "These are my studies over the subject of creation of an
CommonEvent[183].message[0].textLine[2]: artificial life form. Such ability transcends humanity and
CommonEvent[183].message[0].textLine[3]: the limits mankind has set itself."
CommonEvent[183].message[1].textLine[0]: "During my time as a man walking amidst people, such studies
CommonEvent[183].message[1].textLine[1]: were frowned upon. The other scholars would bring such topics
CommonEvent[183].message[1].textLine[2]: as morality or ethics to the table."
CommonEvent[183].message[2].textLine[0]: "But I believe this to be the final pillar we must overcome
CommonEvent[183].message[2].textLine[1]: in order to ascend to the true godhood. To be equals
CommonEvent[183].message[2].textLine[2]: with the older gods. Or even greater..."
CommonEvent[183].message[3].textLine[0]: "The older gods have shown talent for creation of life,
CommonEvent[183].message[4].textLine[0]: "The animated clay figurines that inhabit Ma'habre are
CommonEvent[183].message[4].textLine[1]: a perfect example of this. They are just golems created for
CommonEvent[183].message[4].textLine[2]: physical work. Without rest, they carry on their duties."
CommonEvent[183].message[5].textLine[0]: "The older gods would then create life for different purposes
CommonEvent[183].message[5].textLine[1]: whenever necessary. All this, I believe, eventually led to the
CommonEvent[183].message[5].textLine[2]: creation of the ultimate life form - the human being."
CommonEvent[183].message[6].textLine[0]: "This is the aim of my studies as well. I believe
CommonEvent[183].message[6].textLine[1]: I understand enough to be able to achieve this."
CommonEvent[183].message[7].textLine[0]: "I must achieve this. To be truly self-sufficient,
CommonEvent[183].message[7].textLine[1]: independent in the grand scheme of things: this is the
CommonEvent[183].message[7].textLine[2]: key to the natural progression, where man finally
CommonEvent[184].message[0].textLine[4]: "As my starting point, I decided to create a laborer class,
CommonEvent[184].message[0].textLine[5]: similar to the clay figurines of ancient times."
CommonEvent[184].message[1].textLine[0]: "There is one clear flaw in the design of the clay figurines,
CommonEvent[184].message[1].textLine[1]: however. They are seemingly eternal beings. Only as they get
CommonEvent[184].message[1].textLine[2]: damaged over time do they eventually perish."
CommonEvent[184].message[2].textLine[0]: "I do not believe my creations, my children, so to speak,
CommonEvent[184].message[2].textLine[1]: should ever outlive me, their creator. Their father."
CommonEvent[184].message[3].textLine[0]: "That is why I decided to create the life form from the very
CommonEvent[184].message[3].textLine[1]: same fabric fragile humans were created from: flesh."
CommonEvent[184].message[4].textLine[0]: "The silhouette of the form is very sturdy in order to carry
CommonEvent[184].message[4].textLine[1]: ou*t its working duties. I was able to combine existing materials
CommonEvent[184].message[4].textLine[2]: into one being, and my lifeform had gotten its shape already."
CommonEvent[184].message[5].textLine[0]: "The hairiness is a side-product of mold. It doesn't serve
CommonEvent[184].message[5].textLine[1]: any obvious purpose, but I suppose it could keep the form
CommonEvent[184].message[5].textLine[2]: warm in colder climates as well."
CommonEvent[184].message[6].textLine[0]: "I was able to create this form rather easily and there
CommonEvent[184].message[6].textLine[1]: doesn't seem to be any immediate flaws in its design either."
CommonEvent[184].message[7].textLine[0]: "Before going further with my studies, I decided to test
CommonEvent[184].message[7].textLine[1]: different approaches as well. Besides organic matter, I
CommonEvent[184].message[7].textLine[2]: decided to work on creating mechanical life."
CommonEvent[184].message[8].textLine[0]: "Mechanical structures are far simpler than those created
CommonEvent[184].message[8].textLine[1]: from flesh, so the figurine was ready in just few years."
CommonEvent[184].message[9].textLine[0]: "The figurine is not strong enough for physical labor nor
CommonEvent[184].message[9].textLine[1]: do I need another one for the same purpose, so I repurposed
CommonEvent[184].message[10].textLine[0]: "I have achieved all this in a matter of just a few years.
CommonEvent[184].message[10].textLine[1]: I can only imagine what I'll be able to achieve with the
CommonEvent[186].message[0].textLine[3]: What do you want to transmutate?
CommonEvent[186].message[10].textLine[0]: You do not have any items that support your level of
CommonEvent[187].message[0].textLine[3]: The madness has spread in the dungeons like a plague."
CommonEvent[187].message[1].textLine[0]: "Some even suspected the plague that's running wild in the
CommonEvent[187].message[1].textLine[1]: Kingdom of Rondon might be the cause for all this, but the symptoms
CommonEvent[187].message[3].textLine[0]: "The remaining troops took refuge in these mines in hopes
CommonEvent[187].message[3].textLine[1]: that the Kingdom would send help at some point in time in the
CommonEvent[187].message[4].textLine[0]: "The hope is running low however. Captain Rudimer set foot
CommonEvent[187].message[4].textLine[1]: to the underground city of the cave dwellers and traded
CommonEvent[187].message[4].textLine[2]: that bizarre artefact for food and supplies."
CommonEvent[187].message[5].textLine[0]: "Now those supplies are running low. We try to scavenge
CommonEvent[187].message[5].textLine[1]: food barrels whenever possible, but it's not enough to
CommonEvent[187].message[6].textLine[0]: "The hope is indeed running low, as even the captain seemed
CommonEvent[187].message[6].textLine[1]: to lose his mind some days ago. He ran into the dark dungeons
CommonEvent[187].message[6].textLine[2]: whispering to himself, wearing nothing but a sheet of cloth."
CommonEvent[187].message[7].textLine[0]: "We are going to die down here, aren't we?"
CommonEvent[188].message[1].textLine[1]: "What subject do you want to know more about?"
CommonEvent[188].message[3].textLine[1]: "The poor creature wants to get the gift of the
CommonEvent[188].message[4].textLine[1]: "He was once persuaded by the king of the insects."
CommonEvent[188].message[5].textLine[1]: "Needless to say, his pursuits are in vain."
CommonEvent[188].message[6].textLine[1]: "He was once sentenced to the prisons."
CommonEvent[188].message[7].textLine[1]: "Once he lusted for the blood of women,
CommonEvent[188].message[7].textLine[2]: now nothing is left but his perversions."
CommonEvent[188].message[8].textLine[1]: "Overwhelming physical strength and an endless lust that is
CommonEvent[188].message[8].textLine[2]: only weakened by their loneliness. It manifests in their final
CommonEvent[188].message[9].textLine[1]: "Those whose physical and mental fortitude couldn't handle
CommonEvent[188].message[11].textLine[1]: "Francóis the dominating one has trained the hunting hounds
CommonEvent[188].message[11].textLine[2]: to harass all those who trespass his domain. He named them
CommonEvent[188].message[12].textLine[1]: "Those mindless beasts only taste the blood of their victims
CommonEvent[188].message[12].textLine[2]: in their mouths. That is all they know."
CommonEvent[188].message[13].textLine[1]: "They came from the green hue. Even we don't know their
CommonEvent[188].message[14].textLine[1]: "They manifest around sickness and dead carcasses."
CommonEvent[188].message[15].textLine[1]: "He is a human that was lost to blood magic. The darkness
CommonEvent[188].message[15].textLine[2]: has had its way with him."
CommonEvent[188].message[16].textLine[1]: "He is but a slave to Gro-goroth."
CommonEvent[188].message[17].textLine[1]: "As things started to succumb to chaos in the dungeons of
CommonEvent[188].message[17].textLine[2]: fear and hunger, he was sent here by the Kingdom of Rodon as
CommonEvent[188].message[18].textLine[1]: "In time, he too lost his mind. Now he tries to guard
CommonEvent[188].message[18].textLine[2]: the area from anyone who would set foot in the
CommonEvent[188].message[18].textLine[3]: fortress, loyal to his last breath."
CommonEvent[188].message[19].textLine[1]: "The priests came on a pilgrimage to the dungeons. They
CommonEvent[188].message[19].textLine[2]: are worshippers of both new and older gods."
CommonEvent[188].message[20].textLine[1]: "The little halflings birthed by the Cavemother. Even
CommonEvent[188].message[20].textLine[2]: their mother thinks little of them and uses them to do her
CommonEvent[188].message[21].textLine[1]: "The remaining guards of the fortress. They tried to save
CommonEvent[188].message[21].textLine[2]: themselves with an act of love."
CommonEvent[188].message[22].textLine[1]: "Cavemother, a being who has stayed in the darkness for too
CommonEvent[188].message[22].textLine[2]: long. It longs for human kind to impregnate her."
CommonEvent[188].message[23].textLine[1]: "A lone cave wolf who was once driven away from her pack
CommonEvent[188].message[24].textLine[1]: "The black has its way of changing the nature of wolves."
CommonEvent[188].message[25].textLine[1]: "Long ago, before men took the dungeons as their own, there
CommonEvent[188].message[25].textLine[2]: dwelled a different race in the darkness."
CommonEvent[188].message[26].textLine[1]: "A virtuous knight who was on a path to the darkness at the center
CommonEvent[188].message[27].textLine[1]: "His life was saved by the alchemist Nosramus on his way down,
CommonEvent[188].message[27].textLine[2]: The old knight decided to serve Nosramus for the
CommonEvent[188].message[27].textLine[3]: rest of his life, and beyond."
CommonEvent[188].message[28].textLine[1]: "the true form of the old knight."
CommonEvent[188].message[29].textLine[1]: "Creations of the black. The darkness has had its way with
CommonEvent[188].message[30].textLine[1]: "They are fully erect despite being left untouched for
CommonEvent[188].message[31].textLine[1]: "Primal and savage beings. The poor souls were once stuck in
CommonEvent[188].message[31].textLine[2]: the black because of a cave-in."
CommonEvent[188].message[32].textLine[1]: "Overwhelming physical strength and endless lust that is
CommonEvent[188].message[32].textLine[2]: only weakened by their loneliness. It manifests in their final
CommonEvent[188].message[33].textLine[1]: "An ancient being that swims in the underground waterways.
CommonEvent[188].message[33].textLine[2]: There are many human legends which mention this beast as
CommonEvent[188].message[34].textLine[1]: "He was set on purifying the dungeons from filth and
CommonEvent[188].message[34].textLine[2]: depravation. Little did he know that he would become a part
CommonEvent[188].message[35].textLine[1]: "Unable to satisfy the needs of his victims, he resorts
CommonEvent[188].message[35].textLine[2]: to more violent ways of pleasure."
CommonEvent[188].message[36].textLine[1]: "He traveled far from the east just to stop the spreading
CommonEvent[188].message[37].textLine[1]: "His iron will manifests in his blade even to this day."
CommonEvent[188].message[38].textLine[1]: "Pupils of the Nas'hrah the destroyer. They use the strength
CommonEvent[188].message[38].textLine[2]: of the Gro-goroth to their master's advantage."
CommonEvent[188].message[39].textLine[1]: "A simple reanimated skeleton. The necromancy needs to be
CommonEvent[188].message[39].textLine[2]: stronger in them to animate mere dust and bones, thus their
CommonEvent[188].message[39].textLine[3]: strength is also greater than ghouls."
CommonEvent[188].message[40].textLine[1]: "He who suffered the torture of the tormented one for
CommonEvent[188].message[40].textLine[2]: hundreds of years. With every passing year its pain grows
CommonEvent[188].message[41].textLine[1]: "Valteil the enlightened one, in his attempts to understand
CommonEvent[188].message[41].textLine[2]: the secrets of life, he accidentally created this being."
CommonEvent[188].message[42].textLine[1]: "Men are wicked. Condensed wickedness can manifest in many
CommonEvent[188].message[42].textLine[2]: ways. Scarabs are there to remind us of this."
CommonEvent[188].message[43].textLine[1]: "The fool has traveled wide and far, but has gotten no
CommonEvent[188].message[44].textLine[1]: "A manifestation of your grudge during your stay in the
CommonEvent[188].message[45].textLine[1]: "Valteil the enlightened one created many forms of life for
CommonEvent[188].message[46].textLine[1]: "Uterus serves a purpose too and every night Valteil would
CommonEvent[188].message[46].textLine[2]: summon one of them to his quarters."
CommonEvent[188].message[47].textLine[1]: "An act of love between a cave wolf and a guard."
CommonEvent[188].message[48].textLine[1]: "Only traces of the older gods remain in this plane of
CommonEvent[188].message[48].textLine[2]: existence. Nas'hrah has been able to bend powerful beings
CommonEvent[188].message[49].textLine[1]: "The wretched being was locked behind the sealed door when
CommonEvent[188].message[49].textLine[2]: he was looting the dungeon from valuables."
CommonEvent[188].message[50].textLine[1]: "He turned on the god of the depths for salvation..."
CommonEvent[188].message[51].textLine[1]: "We do not know much about her. She is the servant of the
CommonEvent[188].message[52].textLine[1]: "The moon god has his motivations to meddle with events here
CommonEvent[188].message[52].textLine[2]: but we do not understand them."
CommonEvent[188].message[53].textLine[1]: "The figurine created by the older gods to protect the
CommonEvent[188].message[53].textLine[2]: golden temple of the true king."
CommonEvent[188].message[54].textLine[1]: "He has seen millenia go by, but still the fool waits for
CommonEvent[188].message[55].textLine[1]: "The older gods, before their departure, nominated a king
CommonEvent[188].message[56].textLine[1]: "It's all fallacy. We as the new gods rule Ma'habre now."
CommonEvent[188].message[57].textLine[1]: "The miserable creation that is but mockery of human beings."
CommonEvent[188].message[58].textLine[1]: "It is a simple being created by a new god that once existed
CommonEvent[188].message[58].textLine[2]: who was trying to achieve the power of the older gods with
CommonEvent[188].message[59].textLine[1]: "Before men, the lizardmen roamed as the dominant lifeform."
CommonEvent[188].message[60].textLine[1]: "Like us, they too desired to ascend higher."
CommonEvent[188].message[61].textLine[1]: "What remains of those ancient times are the forms."
CommonEvent[188].message[62].textLine[1]: "Before men, the lizardmen roamed as the dominant lifeform."
CommonEvent[188].message[63].textLine[1]: "Like us, they too desired to ascend higher."
CommonEvent[188].message[64].textLine[1]: "What remains of those ancient times are the forms."
CommonEvent[188].message[65].textLine[1]: "Greater blight is something that rivals the powers of the
CommonEvent[188].message[65].textLine[2]: new gods even to this day and age."
CommonEvent[188].message[66].textLine[1]: "It is truly curious how powerful those ancient relics were
CommonEvent[188].message[67].textLine[1]: "Those ghastly figures are but echoes of the people that
CommonEvent[188].message[68].textLine[1]: "Many of them saw end when the current reign in the dungeons
CommonEvent[188].message[68].textLine[2]: ended just a brief time ago."
CommonEvent[188].message[69].textLine[1]: "Just like how the black changes the humans, it also affects
CommonEvent[188].message[70].textLine[1]: "On this soil, that has seen countless death, that curious
CommonEvent[188].message[71].textLine[1]: "It requires fertile ground to grow to its full bloom and
CommonEvent[188].message[71].textLine[2]: there is no better source of life than humans."
CommonEvent[188].message[72].textLine[1]: "The elite guards who serve the kingdom of Rondon, or at
CommonEvent[188].message[72].textLine[2]: least served while still retaining their sanity."
CommonEvent[188].message[73].textLine[1]: "They carry two red feathers on their helmets to signify their
CommonEvent[188].message[74].textLine[1]: "A white feather of an eagle is given to the squires when
CommonEvent[188].message[75].textLine[1]: "Once the feather changes color and becomes red with
CommonEvent[188].message[75].textLine[2]: the blood it has absorbed on the battlefield. That's when
CommonEvent[188].message[76].textLine[1]: "That's how the tradition originates at least. The tradition
CommonEvent[188].message[76].textLine[2]: has become more civilized as time goes on."
CommonEvent[188].message[77].textLine[1]: "These days you only need to dip the feather into the blood
CommonEvent[188].message[77].textLine[2]: of an opponent to rise in ranks."
CommonEvent[188].message[78].textLine[1]: "Francóis the dominating one has trained the hunting hounds
CommonEvent[188].message[78].textLine[2]: to harass all those who trespass his domain. He named them
CommonEvent[188].message[79].textLine[1]: "Those mindless beasts only taste the blood of their victim
CommonEvent[188].message[79].textLine[2]: in their mouths. That is all they know."
CommonEvent[188].message[80].textLine[1]: "Creations of the black. Once a mumbler develops a
CommonEvent[188].message[80].textLine[2]: consciousness it can finally break free from the restraints
CommonEvent[188].message[80].textLine[3]: of the god of the depths."
CommonEvent[188].message[81].textLine[1]: "Or perhaps not consciousness, but enlightenment? It's hard
CommonEvent[188].message[81].textLine[2]: to tell. These creatures don't function in the same way as
CommonEvent[188].message[82].textLine[1]: "No longer forced to be a mindless servant of the god,
CommonEvent[188].message[82].textLine[2]: no one knows their true ambitions."
CommonEvent[188].message[83].textLine[1]: "Valteil the enlightened one has succumbed to fleshly
CommonEvent[188].message[83].textLine[2]: delights, carrying on with his own creations."
CommonEvent[188].message[84].textLine[1]: "Embryos are the bastardization that came from that act."
CommonEvent[188].message[85].textLine[1]: "An act of love between a lizardman and a yellow mage. The
CommonEvent[188].message[85].textLine[2]: being that came from the act seems to share the intelligence
CommonEvent[188].message[86].textLine[1]: "However it does not know for certain which tribe it truly
CommonEvent[188].message[86].textLine[2]: belongs to. Thus it wanders the darkness alone."
CommonEvent[188].message[87].textLine[1]: "A poor soul that got distorted by the ever-looming trickster
CommonEvent[188].message[88].textLine[1]: "Even we are not sure if his appendage grew to have a life
CommonEvent[188].message[88].textLine[2]: of its own or if it was a parasite that made the malformation
CommonEvent[188].message[89].textLine[1]: "A being that lurks in the shadows. Different tales about Ronteal
CommonEvent[188].message[89].textLine[2]: have been passed on for many generations."
CommonEvent[188].message[90].textLine[1]: "It is said that Ronteal appears first in the nightmares, only
CommonEvent[188].message[90].textLine[2]: to fuel his or her own materialization to the physical world
CommonEvent[188].message[91].textLine[1]: "A myth passed on by the wildmen of the north and those who
CommonEvent[188].message[91].textLine[2]: live in Oldegård and its surrounding areas."
CommonEvent[188].message[92].textLine[1]: "The myth if typically told to new generations as a
CommonEvent[188].message[92].textLine[2]: cautionary tale of what happens if you abandon your family
CommonEvent[188].message[93].textLine[1]: "The black is said to creep from the dark corners of your
CommonEvent[188].message[93].textLine[2]: home cabin, slowly nibbling the form of your beloved ones."
CommonEvent[188].message[94].textLine[1]: "The creature is of course just a myth, but the tale lives
CommonEvent[188].message[94].textLine[2]: on deep in the consciousness of the northern folk and
CommonEvent[188].message[94].textLine[3]: oftentimes the creature has a vivid presence in nightmares."
CommonEvent[188].message[95].textLine[1]: "An old warrior deity worshipped in the far reaches of the
CommonEvent[188].message[96].textLine[1]: "Yggaegetsu seems to become more significant during times of
CommonEvent[188].message[96].textLine[2]: peace, when the warriors are left without purpose."
CommonEvent[188].message[97].textLine[1]: "Warriors of all kind would travel the world in search of
CommonEvent[188].message[97].textLine[2]: this deity, to challenge it to a duel, to give purpose to
CommonEvent[188].message[98].textLine[1]: "What an oddly specific thing to ask. The Tainted One is of
CommonEvent[188].message[98].textLine[2]: course one of us. One of the many who sits in the grand hall."
CommonEvent[188].message[99].textLine[1]: "A person born with a soul that is tainted and who then rose
CommonEvent[188].message[100].textLine[1: "Per'kele and the group associated with that figure..."
CommonEvent[188].message[101].textLine[1: "You might recognize them by the body paint covering their
CommonEvent[188].message[102].textLine[1: "They are but leeches. Leeching on the older gods, pursuing

CommonEvent[197].message[0].textLine[3]: "You only come to realize the greater scheme of things as
CommonEvent[197].message[0].textLine[4]: you ascend to become a new god."
CommonEvent[197].message[1].textLine[1]: "Time is a cycle as cliché as that sounds."
CommonEvent[197].message[2].textLine[1]: "The gift of the Gro-goroth to mankind. As his presence
CommonEvent[197].message[3].textLine[1]: "Older gods left us without answers in the times of peril.
CommonEvent[197].message[3].textLine[2]: For men to take matters into their own hands, we had to form."

CommonEvent[197].message[14].textLine[1]: "Older gods left us without answers in the times of peril.
CommonEvent[197].message[14].textLine[2]: For men to take matters into their own hands, we had to form."
CommonEvent[197].message[15].textLine[1]: "We are many as you can see. But we have taken a seat in
CommonEvent[197].message[15].textLine[2]: the grand hall for now to let the new ones reign for their
CommonEvent[197].message[16].textLine[1]: "What you are to become is up to you."
CommonEvent[197].message[17].textLine[1]: "Men and women are born to suffer. No matter what your
CommonEvent[197].message[17].textLine[2]: pursuits are, humans are never content."
CommonEvent[197].message[18].textLine[1]: "Love is something that is unique to every person. Love can
CommonEvent[197].message[19].textLine[1]: "You can form love on your own, or it can form on its won
CommonEvent[197].message[20].textLine[1]: "It is a term commonly used with the tale about the ascension
CommonEvent[197].message[20].textLine[2]: of the current generation of new gods."
CommonEvent[197].message[21].textLine[1]: "This is not the time and place for such things.
CommonEvent[197].message[21].textLine[2]: The throne of ascension is located elsewhere."
CommonEvent[197].message[22].textLine[1]: "Whether you are worthy of ascension or not, remains to be
CommonEvent[197].message[23].textLine[1]: "The hue that emanates from the true Ma'habre. The plane
CommonEvent[197].message[24].textLine[1]: "The festival of Termina is an event arranged by the older
CommonEvent[197].message[25].textLine[1]: "To our knowledge the moon god is often involved in this
CommonEvent[197].message[26].textLine[1]: "We do not understand the underlying meaning behind this
CommonEvent[197].message[26].textLine[2]: festival, but in short it is a free-for-all, a battle royale
CommonEvent[197].message[26].textLine[3]: if you will, between multiple contestants."
CommonEvent[197].message[27].textLine[1]: "Supposedly there is a grand prize waiting at the end."
CommonEvent[197].message[28].textLine[1]: "The older god that came to be from the union of Sylvian
CommonEvent[197].message[29].textLine[1]: "Vinushka is synonymous with the nature. The god appears in
CommonEvent[197].message[29].textLine[2]: different forms in different regions of the world."
CommonEvent[197].message[30].textLine[1]: "This is only natural as the nature itself appears in
CommonEvent[197].message[30].textLine[2]: different forms around the world as well."
CommonEvent[197].message[31].textLine[1]: "These peculiar beasts run wild in the deepest forests of
CommonEvent[197].message[32].textLine[1]: "They got a clear alignment with the older god Vinushka,
CommonEvent[197].message[32].textLine[2]: but exactly what this connection is... we do not know."
CommonEvent[197].message[33].textLine[1]: "The Iki-turso are known to rise from their slumber during
CommonEvent[197].message[33].textLine[2]: the times when the nature is under a threat."

CommonEvent[198].message[1].textLine[1]: "It was once formed out of hundreds of small warring nations
CommonEvent[198].message[1].textLine[2]: and tribes to fight under one flag."
CommonEvent[198].message[2].textLine[1]: "The northern kingdom that has stayed independant for the
CommonEvent[198].message[3].textLine[1]: "Known for their iron will and advanced ships that sail
CommonEvent[198].message[3].textLine[2]: even to the most western continents."

CommonEvent[198].message[6].textLine[1]: "The holy city of the Eastern Sanctuaries. Originally the
CommonEvent[198].message[6].textLine[2]: homeland of the older god Alll-mer."
CommonEvent[198].message[7].textLine[1]: "A hotspot for all trading, be it from the east or west."
CommonEvent[198].message[8].textLine[1]: "The continent of the old world order. A land unknown for
CommonEvent[198].message[8].textLine[2]: the most parts in the western world.
CommonEvent[198].message[9].textLine[1]: "Even us, the new gods, know little of the continent."

CommonEvent[198].message[11].textLine[1]: "Even us, the new gods, know little of this part of the world.
CommonEvent[198].message[11].textLine[2]: The continent is tightly connected to the older gods."

CommonEvent[224].message[0].textLine[3]: "The poor creature wants to get the gift of the
CommonEvent[224].message[1].textLine[1]: "He was once persuaded by the king of the insects."
CommonEvent[224].message[2].textLine[1]: "Needless to say his pursuits are in vain."
CommonEvent[224].message[3].textLine[1]: "He was once sentenced to the prisons."
CommonEvent[224].message[4].textLine[1]: "He used to lust to hurt women. Now he is the epitome of his
CommonEvent[224].message[5].textLine[1]: "Overwhelming physical strength and endless lust that is
CommonEvent[224].message[5].textLine[2]: only weakened by their loneliness. It manifests in their final
CommonEvent[224].message[6].textLine[1]: "Those whose physical and mental fortitude couldn't handle
CommonEvent[224].message[8].textLine[1]: "Francóis the dominating one has trained the hunting hounds to
CommonEvent[224].message[8].textLine[2]: harass all those who trespass his domain."
CommonEvent[224].message[9].textLine[1]: "Those mindless beasts only taste the blood of their victim
CommonEvent[224].message[9].textLine[2]: in their mouth. That is all they know."
CommonEvent[224].message[10].textLine[1]: "They came from the green hue. Even we don't know their
CommonEvent[224].message[11].textLine[1]: "They manifest around sickness and dead carcasses."
CommonEvent[224].message[12].textLine[1]: "He is a human that was lost to blood magic. The darkness
CommonEvent[224].message[12].textLine[2]: has had its way with him."
CommonEvent[224].message[13].textLine[1]: "He is but a slave to Gro-goroth."
CommonEvent[224].message[14].textLine[1]: "As things started to succumb to chaos in the dungeons of
CommonEvent[224].message[14].textLine[2]: fear and hunger, he was sent here by the Kingdom of Rodon as
CommonEvent[224].message[15].textLine[1]: "In short time, he too lost his mind. Now he tries to guard
CommonEvent[224].message[15].textLine[2]: the area from anyone who would set foot in the
CommonEvent[224].message[15].textLine[3]: fortress, loyal to his last breath."
CommonEvent[224].message[16].textLine[1]: "The priests came on a pilgrimage to the dungeons. They
CommonEvent[224].message[16].textLine[2]: are worshippers of both new and older gods."
CommonEvent[224].message[17].textLine[1]: "The little halflings given birth by the Cavemother. Even
CommonEvent[224].message[17].textLine[2]: their mother thinks little of them and uses them to do her
CommonEvent[224].message[18].textLine[1]: "The remaining guards of the fortress. They tried to save
CommonEvent[224].message[18].textLine[2]: themselves with an act of love."
CommonEvent[224].message[19].textLine[1]: "Cavemother, a being who has stayed in the darkness for too
CommonEvent[224].message[19].textLine[2]: long. It longs for human kind to impregnate her."
CommonEvent[224].message[20].textLine[1]: "A lone cave wolf who was once driven away from her pack
CommonEvent[224].message[21].textLine[1]: "The black has its way of changing the nature of wolves."
CommonEvent[224].message[22].textLine[1]: "Long ago, before men took the dungeons as their own, there
CommonEvent[224].message[22].textLine[2]: dwelled a different race in the black."
CommonEvent[224].message[23].textLine[1]: "A virtuous knight who was on a path to the black of the
CommonEvent[224].message[24].textLine[1]: "He met the alchemist on his way down, and Nosramus saved
CommonEvent[224].message[24].textLine[2]: his life. The old knight decided to serve Nosramus for his
CommonEvent[224].message[25].textLine[1]: "the true form of the old knight."
CommonEvent[224].message[26].textLine[1]: "Creations of the black. The darkness has had its way with
CommonEvent[224].message[27].textLine[1]: "They are fully erect despite being left untouched for
CommonEvent[224].message[28].textLine[1]: "Primal and savage beings. The poor souls were once stuck in
CommonEvent[224].message[28].textLine[2]: the black because of a cave-in."
CommonEvent[224].message[29].textLine[1]: "Overwhelming physical strength and endless lust that is
CommonEvent[224].message[29].textLine[2]: only weakened by their loneliness. It manifests in their final
CommonEvent[224].message[30].textLine[1]: "An ancient being that swims in the underground waterways.

CommonEvent[224].message[31].textLine[1]: "He was set on purifying the dungeons from filth and

CommonEvent[224].message[33].textLine[1]: "He traveled far from the east just to stop the spreading

CommonEvent[224].message[37].textLine[1]: "He who suffered the torture of the tormented one for

CommonEvent[224].message[45].textLine[2]: existence. Nas'hrah has been able to bend a powerful being

CommonEvent[224].message[47].textLine[1]: "He turned on the god of the depths for salvation..."

CommonEvent[224].message[51].textLine[1]: "He has seen millenia go by, but still the fool waits for

CommonEvent[228].message[0].textLine[2]: "-The Tale of the Pocketcat. Chapter II -
CommonEvent[228].message[0].textLine[3]: The town of Merwood was in festive mood. It was the beginning
CommonEvent[228].message[0].textLine[4]: of the harvest season and food was plentiful."
CommonEvent[228].message[1].textLine[0]: "Willem's mother and father were arranging a large party
CommonEvent[228].message[1].textLine[1]: for all the big families of the town. Even some noble ones
CommonEvent[228].message[1].textLine[2]: were supposed to show up from out of town."
CommonEvent[228].message[2].textLine[0]: "Willem had to wear his Sunday suit. The suit he would
CommonEvent[228].message[2].textLine[1]: typically wear when going to the church on Sundays. Needless
CommonEvent[228].message[2].textLine[2]: to say, the suit wasn't to Willem's liking."
CommonEvent[228].message[3].textLine[0]: "'Now, now. You know we need to make good impressions to
CommonEvent[228].message[3].textLine[1]: the city folk.' - his mother would say."
CommonEvent[228].message[5].textLine[0]: "Willem's mother would pull him by the ear violently and say:
CommonEvent[228].message[5].textLine[1]: 'Don't you understand? Our livelihood depends on those nobles
CommonEvent[228].message[6].textLine[0]: "Willem shrugged it off and nodded. It is important to obey
CommonEvent[228].message[6].textLine[1]: your parents after all, if you are to grow up even
CommonEvent[228].message[7].textLine[0]: "This truth is even written in the book of our lord, the bible of
CommonEvent[228].message[8].textLine[0]: "The party guests started coming as the sun set. The festive
CommonEvent[228].message[9].textLine[0]: "You had the well-eaten mayor of the town and his wife, who
CommonEvent[228].message[9].textLine[1]: was so young, she couldn't have been more than three years
CommonEvent[228].message[10].textLine[0]: "You had the Parkinsons from the next door, with their faces
CommonEvent[228].message[10].textLine[1]: forever set in an expression of pure disgust."
CommonEvent[228].message[11].textLine[0]: "There were also many people Willem had never seen before.
CommonEvent[228].message[11].textLine[1]: One gay gentleman with a constant grin on his face
CommonEvent[228].message[12].textLine[0]: "The man also noticed young Willem. He winked his eye,
CommonEvent[228].message[12].textLine[1]: even though otherwise his face was set in the same grin
CommonEvent[228].message[13].textLine[0]: "The odd gentleman gave Willem the creeps."
CommonEvent[228].message[14].textLine[0]: "As the full moon reached its peak and the festive
CommonEvent[228].message[14].textLine[1]: people were at their most cocked, Willem noticed the gay
CommonEvent[228].message[15].textLine[0]: "After a short search, he found the man in their backyard,
CommonEvent[228].message[16].textLine[0]: "This already made young Willem very nervous, but then the
CommonEvent[228].message[16].textLine[1]: man turned his gaze towards Willem..."
CommonEvent[228].message[17].textLine[0]: "His eyes were the same as the two haunting yellow eyes
CommonEvent[228].message[17].textLine[1]: Willem had seen in the Merwood forest some days ago!"
CommonEvent[228].message[18].textLine[0]: "Suddenly, Willem realized the size of the man. For some
CommonEvent[228].message[18].textLine[1]: reason, he had not realized it before, but the man was almost
CommonEvent[228].message[18].textLine[2]: the same height as their house!"
CommonEvent[228].message[19].textLine[0]: "With a cat-like expression the man said, 'Fancy meeting
CommonEvent[228].message[20].textLine[0]: The illustration on the book looks very lifelike. The
CommonEvent[228].message[20].textLine[1]: Pocketcat seems to stare staight at you from the book pages.
CommonEvent[228].message[21].textLine[0]: "The Pocketcat said, 'So how do you think we should
CommonEvent[228].message[21].textLine[1]: handle the situation now that you've seen something you

"I will reveal you for what you truly are!"

CommonEvent[228].message[27].textLine[1]: said with glee in his eyes."

CommonEvent[228].message[30].textLine[0]: "But, well, let us not dwell on those matters.
CommonEvent[228].message[30].textLine[1]: The night is festive. It is full moon after all.'"
CommonEvent[228].message[31].textLine[0]: "While the cat-like man stares at the moon, he also murmurs
CommonEvent[228].message[31].textLine[1]: something... 'Oh Old One, do my lullabies fall on deaf ears?
CommonEvent[228].message[31].textLine[2]: Mankind pursues the same goals again and again.'"
CommonEvent[228].message[32].textLine[0]: "The cat asks you one last question: 'If I were to give the
CommonEvent[228].message[32].textLine[1]: moon itself to you, would you give up on your quest and lay
CommonEvent[228].message[33].textChoice[: "Yes I will give up on my quest."
"No, I'm afraid I can't do that."

CommonEvent[232].message[1].textLine[0]: "Our initial mission in the dungeons has failed. We have
CommonEvent[232].message[1].textLine[1]: let down captain Rudimer of the dungeons. He is beyond
CommonEvent[232].message[2].textLine[0]: "If you do run into him, or what's left of him, spare
CommonEvent[232].message[2].textLine[1]: whatever honor he has left and put him out of his misery."
CommonEvent[232].message[3].textLine[0]: "We cannot spend another fleeting minute in this darkness.
CommonEvent[232].message[3].textLine[1]: We fear for our lives and fear for what we cannot control -
CommonEvent[232].message[4].textLine[0]: "I must admit with great shame that we must continue our
CommonEvent[232].message[4].textLine[1]: journey without meeting you in person."
CommonEvent[232].message[5].textLine[0]: "For all the things you've done for us, I leave you one
CommonEvent[232].message[5].textLine[1]: of my precious family heirlooms - the ring of wraiths.
CommonEvent[232].message[5].textLine[2]: May it aid in your quest to reach even deeper depths."

CommonEvent[245].message[0].textLine[2]: The book is written by an alchemist by the name of Nosramus.

CommonEvent[245].message[1].textLine[1]: secrets of the older god Sylvian and her gifts of creation.
CommonEvent[245].message[2].textLine[0]: The book goes in to details on the macabre ways of laying
CommonEvent[245].message[2].textLine[1]: down your seed in the most fertile grounds possible, a
CommonEvent[245].message[3].textLine[0]: The magic of \c[2]Demon seed\c[0] would then give you a
CommonEvent[245].message[3].textLine[1]: child tainted by the touch of the older gods.

CommonEvent[263].message[0].textLine[1]: "The Penance Knights are a special unit of the Vatican
CommonEvent[263].message[0].textLine[2]: that wear tailor-made armor. The Penance Knights are used
CommonEvent[263].message[0].textLine[3]: in the most perilous tasks and missions where the chances
CommonEvent[263].message[1].textLine[0]: "Thus the armor has been designed only to be put on.
CommonEvent[263].message[1].textLine[1]: There is no removing it once one is chosen for the mission."
CommonEvent[263].message[2].textLine[0]: "The armor has rows of small spikes that drill into the
CommonEvent[263].message[2].textLine[1]: skin of its wearer. The pain is meant to cleanse the mind
CommonEvent[263].message[2].textLine[2]: for the task at hand and also heighten their fury in the
CommonEvent[263].message[3].textLine[0]: "Because of the nature of the Penance Knights and the
CommonEvent[263].message[3].textLine[1]: Penance Armor, only convicts with life or death sentences
CommonEvent[263].message[4].textLine[0]: "The recruits are given one last chance to repent their
CommonEvent[263].message[4].textLine[1]: crimes and atone their sins before the ascended one
CommonEvent[263].message[4].textLine[2]: Alll-mer passes on the final judgement."

CommonEvent[276].message[1].textLine[1]: "I... I can't go on anymore. I need a break from all this..."
CommonEvent[276].message[2].textChoice[2: "Pull yourself together! We can't rest here."
CommonEvent[276].message[2].textChoice[3: "Let's push just a little bit further..."
CommonEvent[276].message[2].textChoice[4: "If you are so eager to die here, go ahead."
CommonEvent[276].message[3].textLine[1]: "To be fully honest... This darkness. It's getting to me."
CommonEvent[276].message[4].textLine[1]: "I see familiar faces in the darkness... Real ghosts of the
CommonEvent[276].message[4].textLine[2]: past. I know they couldn't possibly be there, but still..."
CommonEvent[276].message[5].textLine[1]: "Their voices are calling me... They are saying I belong here."
CommonEvent[276].message[6].textChoice[0: "Don't give in. We really need to just keep going!"
CommonEvent[276].message[6].textChoice[1: "You're losing your mind. Get a grip!"
CommonEvent[276].message[6].textChoice[2: "Maybe you can rest for a while..."
CommonEvent[276].message[7].textLine[1]: "Yeah... yeah... You're right. Let's just keep on going..."
CommonEvent[276].message[8].textLine[1]: "No shit. I know it's not real."
CommonEvent[276].message[9].textLine[1]: "but that doesn't change the fact that I need to--"
CommonEvent[276].message[10].textLine[1]: "I really need to sit down for a while... What I don't need
CommonEvent[276].message[12].textLine[1]: "We need your sword. Don't give in to the fear."
CommonEvent[276].message[13].textLine[1]: "I can tell your life hasn't been the easiest. You haven't
CommonEvent[276].message[13].textLine[2]: given in to the fear before. Why start now?"
CommonEvent[276].message[16].textLine[1]: "I can't say no to pretty eyes, now can I?"
CommonEvent[276].message[17].textLine[1]: "Fine dollface. Let's try this one more time..."
CommonEvent[276].message[18].textLine[0]: D'arce gives Cahara a cautious smile.
CommonEvent[276].message[20].textLine[1]: "You'll end up as troll dinner in these tunnels alone."
CommonEvent[276].message[21].textLine[1]: "I know you are better than this. Let's continue together."
CommonEvent[276].message[24].textLine[1]: "Fine. Let's try this one more time..."
CommonEvent[276].message[26].textLine[1]: "Yeah... Just let me sit down for a bit..."
CommonEvent[276].message[27].textLine[1]: "The voices are calling me... They are saying I belong here."
